select einum, sunum, memnum, div_type, loc, intr, program, title, price, times, mater,sessionnum, hinum, regdate , people,reason from experience_info where memnum=#{memnum} and (div_type=31 or div_type=41 or div_type=39 or div_type=49)

SELECT e.memnum , e.div_type ,e.title, e.hinum ,s.subname ,e.loc , e.intr , e.program , e.price, e.times , e.mater FROM experience_info e INNER JOIN subDetail s ON e.sunum = s.sunum and (e.div_type=32 or e.div_type=42)
select hinum, img , ordernum from house_img where hinum=#{hinum}

SELECT e.memnum , e.div_type ,e.title, e.hinum ,s.subname ,e.loc , e.intr , e.program , e.price, e.times , e.mater FROM experience_info e INNER JOIN subDetail s ON e.sunum = s.sunum and (e.div_type=32 or e.div_type=42 or e.div_type=39 or e.div_type=49) and hinum=#{hinum};
mapper.update: update experience_info set div_type=#{div_type} , regdate=now() where hinum=#{hinum}
update experience_info set div_type=#{divtype} , reason=#{text} where hinum=#{hinum}
